title: Will I get grace marks if I get 3-4 marks lower than the passing marks in ISC maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you should get that .Because ISC hardly fails people I think there are high chances for you to get grace marks . Do not worry you will pass give me a upvote when your results come out I am sure you will get more than you deserve. Pray to god in the meantime and forget about it . give your other examinations with your full determination and i am sure you will taste the fruit of hard labour .
So as you posted this question last year So did you got those grace marks I mean were you able to pass Because I also have this same question for my isc 2020 result
